articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Georgia's Collins takes Iran debate in an unusually toxic direction
articles.description: A leading House Republican believes Democrats are "in love with terrorists." if Rep. Doug Collins (R-Ga.) really wants to go there, let's have the conversation.
articles.content: There’s no shortage of reasons to have concerns about Donald Trump’s decision to order an airstrike that killed an Iranian general last week. After all, the mission risked sparking a war, while adding increased instability in the Middle East. It also alienate… [+3133 chars]

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Senator says the U.S. is not safer after Soleimani killing
articles.description: Sen. Chris Murphy, D-Conn., says the United States is not safer following the killing of Gen. Soleimani, and he also discusses transferring articles of impeachment to the Senate.

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Trump's newly announced Iranian sanctions may not exist
articles.description: To punish Iran for its missile strikes, Trump announced "powerful" new sanctions. It appears those sanctions may not actually exist.
articles.content: In the wake of Iran firing ballistic missiles in the direction of American troops this week, Donald Trump, thankfully, suggested yesterday he didn’t want to escalate matters with a retaliatory strike of his own. That said, the Republican also seemed eager to … [+1869 chars]

articles.title: A conflict avoided for now, but a 'low-grade war' continues
articles.description: The Morning Joe panel recap the president's Wednesday address on Iran.

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: 'Insulting' briefing exposes Trump's hollow policy on Iran
articles.description: Trump and his team don't have a compelling explanation for the Soleimani airstrike. Or a strategy. Or a policymaking process. Or a vision for the road ahead.
articles.content:
Congress unimpressed by Trump admin explanation for Iran attack 
It’s been a week since a U.S. airstrike killed Iranian Gen. Qassem Soleimani, touching off a crisis in the region, and there’s been no shortage of questions about why, exactly, Donald Trump lau… [+2664 chars]

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Sen. Graham compares Trump to Reagan; Morning Joe reacts
articles.description: Sen. Lindsey Graham, R-SC, compared President Trump's address to President Reagan's infamous Berlin Wall speech. Morning Joe kicks off Thursday's show with a reaction.
